articles.title: Matt Kenseth returning to NASCAR to fill Kyle Larson's seat at Ganassi - Fox News
articles.description: An "unexpected opportunity" for Kenseth.
articles.content:
The 2003 NASCAR Cup champion Matt Kenseth will return to racing this year in the Chip Ganassi Racing No. 42 car that was formerly driven by Kyle Larson.
